title: Champion Rotation is still same
body: Hello, i'm playing on EUW and i'm just lvl 7, but i think there's something wrong because i have same Champs for like month (Brand, Ahri, NÃ¡mi, Sona, Darius, Xin, Illaoi,...)  Game is pretty boring now because i dont have enough IP to buy new Champs and playing few Champs is boring. What can i do to have normal champ Rotation?

replies.body: The champion rotation has been going through some changes.  >.< Currently, the free weekly rotation should be come available after level 10, per our [champion guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752864-Choosing-the-Right-Champion)
